QuestData.Title: Sail With the Tide
QuestData.Description:
Hello, $p.
I have received word from Calia asking that we meet with her once again.
She has so much to offer those who feel lost, those seeking a better way. Once she is free of doubt, she will know what must be done.
Will you join me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Calia Menethil and Derek Proudmoore.
